Mn.reference: Al-Taani et al., 2014 for the Northern Gulf of Aqaba

Fe.reference: Al-Taani et al., 2014 for the Northern Gulf of Aqaba

Cl.reference: https://www.lenntech.com/composition-seawater.htm in the Red Sea, and Longinelli and Craig, 1967

Na.reference: https://www.lenntech.com/composition-seawater.htm in the Red Sea, and Longinelli and Craig, 1967 describes [Na]=15834

Sr.reference: Bernat, Church, and Allegre, 1972 from the Mediterranean

Ba.reference: Bernat, Church, and Allegre, 1972 from the Mediterranean

Li.reference: Stoffyn-Egli and Mackenzie, 1984 for the Mediterranean Sea

temperature.reference: average of Al-Taani et al., 2014 and Longinelli and Craig, 1967.

pe.reference: Al-Taani et al., 2014 // 4.00 is the default (?)

Alkalinity.reference: Sabine et al., 2002 as reported for the Indian Ocean
